rules.rule_definition: Ensure that specific parameters in datasets or reports remain within defined thresholds.
rules.action_on_violation: Flag as anomaly, record in anomaly log, trigger planner or troubleshooting agent.

rules.rule_definition: Components or equipment must follow a predefined service or calibration schedule.
rules.action_on_violation: Mark maintenance overdue, alert service agent.

rules.rule_definition: All uploaded text or PDF documents must be made AI-searchable after ingestion.
rules.action_on_violation: Trigger re-index pipeline, notify ingestion agent.

rules.rule_definition: Data from analytical reports must align with logsheet and titration calculations.
rules.action_on_violation: Notify planner agent to recompute related values and flag mismatch.

rules.rule_definition: If an anomaly or failure occurs, cross-reference equipment manuals and manufacturer websites for solutions.
rules.action_on_violation: Trigger web search or retrieval from local indexed manuals.

rules.rule_definition: Whenever a logged parameter exceeds its defined operational range, generate a structured anomaly report.
rules.action_on_violation: Store anomaly JSON, initiate corrective workflow, append history to dashboard.
